text: Hāfu is a Japanese language term used to refer to an individual born to one ethnic Japanese and one non-Japanese parent. Hafu may also refer to: * Hafu (film), a 2013 documentary about mixed-race, half Japanese people in Japan * Hafu (video game player) (born 1991), American video game player * Ha'afuasia, a village in Wallis * Hafun, a town in Somalia
title: Hafu (disambiguation)
